data.title: All About Danny Masterson I Age, Net Worth, Relationship, Career – Biography, Net Worth, Age, Weight, Height, Relationships
data.meta_description: American DJ and actor Danny Masterson works in both fields. His roles on the Fox sitcom That '70s Show and, starting in 2016, the Netflix comedy series
data.text:
American DJ and actor Danny Masterson works in both fields. His roles on the Fox sitcom That ’70s Show and, starting in 2016, the Netflix comedy series The Ranch, on which he also served as co-executive producer on some episodes, have made him the star of those shows.

What is Danny Masterson’s Net Worth? Salary, Earnings

As of March 2023, Danny Masterson’s net worth is projected to be over $20 million. His acting profession, Utah bar, and evidence indicating that he is a co-owner of two Los Angeles restaurants, Dolce Restaurant and Geisha House, are the sources of his wealth.

That ’70s Show, Cybill, Men at Work, The Ranch, Face/Off, The Chicago 8, Yes Man and other popular and high-paying projects are among his best-known and most successful roles.

Danny Masterson has appeared in several popular films and television shows. Since childhood, he has appeared in over 100 television commercials. Since 2011, Danny Masterson has been married to singer and actress Bijou Phillips, and the union seems to be happy.

Where was Danny Masterson born? Ethnicity, Nationality, Family, Education

Daniel Peter Masterson was born on March 13, 1976 in Long Island, New York. His mother, Carol Masterson, is a film producer and his father, Peter Masterson, works in the insurance business.

Christopher Masterson and Will Masterson of Peter and Carol, actor Jordan Masterson and actress Alanna Masterson of Carol Masterson and Joe Reiche are Danny Masterson’s three siblings. Danny received his high school diploma from Garden City.

Danny Masterson Daniel Peter Masterson Male 46 years March 13, 1976 Albertson, New York, United States American 1.78 meters 75kg Right Married Bijou Phillips (d. 2011) Yes (Fianna Francis Masterson) N/A American actor and disc jockey $20 million June 2022

Is Danny Masterson married? Relationship

Both Christina Carnell and Bobette Riales, actresses, were in relationships with Danny Masterson. In 2009, Danny Masterson proposed to Bijou Phillips and they got married in 2011. Their first child, Fianna Francis Masterson, was born on February 14, 2014. The family is currently living together and seems happy.

How tall is Danny Masterson? Weight, Hair color

As of 2022, Danny Masterson will be 46 years old. He was born on March 13, 1976. He is 1.78 meters tall and weighs 75 kilograms.

How did Danny Masterson start his professional career?

As a child, Danny Masterson appeared in magazine articles, television commercials, and made several appearances in advertisements for various companies, including JBS USA Holdings, Inc., Clearasil, a skin care and acne treatment company, and others.

In 1993, the family film Beethoven’s 2nd was released, starring Danny Masterson. He also had a cameo in the comedy series Joe’s Life that same year, 1993.

She continues to appear in numerous films and television shows. One of her most notable appearances was on the CBS sitcom Cybill, which ran from 1996 to 1998. She has appeared in the comedy Yes Man and the action film Face/Off.

Danny Masterson rose to fame on the comedy series That ’70s Show, which ran from 1998 to 2006. In 2011, he made appearances in the drama The Chicago 8, the comedy Raising Hope, the action comedy Supah Ninjas, and the crime drama White Collar.

Since 2016, Danny has appeared in the comedy series The Ranch. In the upcoming thriller In Limbo, Danny Masterson will reportedly direct, produce and star. Additionally, he will appear in the 2018 comedy Killing Winston Jones.

Downstairs, a bar in Park City, Summit County, Utah, is owned by Danny Masterson. He has also appeared on the covers of several publications, including Yellow Rat Bastard and the independent PAPER.

There aren’t many nominations and wins for Danny Masterson. He was only awarded a Jury Award for Best Florida Comedy (Capers, 2008). Danny Masterson has earned nominations for the Young Artist Award for Best Performance in a TV Series – Young Ensemble (That 70’s Show, 1999) and nominations for the Teen Choice Award for TV – Choice Sidekick (That 70’s Show, 2000).
